title: Create generic status-reporting skill for baselayer
description:
Extract the universal "sitrep" pattern from user config into a generic status-reporting skill for baselayer.

The core methodology is universal:
- Status aggregation at session start
- Multi-source information synthesis
- Unified presentation format
- Time-based filtering

Tool-specific integrations (Graphite, GitHub, Linear, Logbooks) should go to references/ so users can add their own.
design:
Location: `baselayer/skills/status-reporting/`

Structure:
```
status-reporting/
├── SKILL.md              # Core pattern: gather → aggregate → present
├── references/
│   ├── graphite.md       # Graphite stack visualization
│   ├── github.md         # GitHub PR/CI queries
│   └── linear.md         # Linear MCP integration
```

SKILL.md covers:
1. What to gather (VCS state, PR status, issue activity, CI health)
2. How to aggregate (time filtering, stack-awareness, cross-referencing)
3. How to present (scannable format, actionable insights)
4. Natural language time parsing ("last 24 hours" → query params)

References are optional — loaded when tools detected.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] SKILL.md created with generic status reporting methodology
- [ ] references/graphite.md for Graphite-specific commands
- [ ] references/github.md for GitHub CLI queries
- [ ] references/linear.md for Linear MCP integration
- [ ] Follows skills-authoring best practices (<500 lines SKILL.md)
- [ ] Third-person description with trigger keywords
- [ ] Examples of output format included

title: Create debugger subagent for baselayer
description:
Add a dedicated debugger subagent to baselayer that provides focused expertise for systematic debugging tasks.

Currently the developer agent loads debugging skill when bugs appear, but a dedicated debugger agent would:
- Provide clearer routing ("debug this" → debugger agent)
- Focused system prompt for investigation mindset
- Load both debugging-and-diagnosis AND investigation skills
- Match mental model of "specialist debugger"
design:
Location: `baselayer/agents/debugger.md`

Skills to load:
- debugging-and-diagnosis (primary)
- investigation (for deeper analysis)

Triggers: debug, fix, broken, failing, error, bug, crash, investigate, troubleshoot

Philosophy: Evidence before action, NEVER guess-and-fix

Follow existing agent patterns in baselayer (developer.md, reviewer.md) for structure.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Debugger agent created at baselayer/agents/debugger.md
- [ ] Proper YAML frontmatter with examples
- [ ] Loads debugging-and-diagnosis skill
- [ ] Loads investigation skill
- [ ] Clear trigger keywords in description
- [ ] Follows baselayer agent patterns (see SUBAGENTS.md)
- [ ] Plugin.json updated if needed
